lines.text: When you kill someone, make sure they're dead.
What does it take to get laid around here?
[Julie, Odin, and Zeek need to cross the lava river]

[to Julie]
I am Chartog, guardian of the river. I know the way across, and I will tell you. You just have to...
[Chuckles pervertedly]
... kiss me.
Ugh... No way!

[chuckles]
What's the matter, my precious? Don't you find me... attractive?
[chuckles pervertedly]

[hesitantly]
Ugh... if this is what it takes to kill Tyler...

[chuckles]
That's a good girl. Help your friends... it will be over soon...

[leans in, groans]
Who will I have to kiss to get back?
[Kisses Chartog, his slimey tongue darting into her mouth]

[sees what's going on]
Hey, what are you doing?
[Julie sees him and Odin on the boat, which is floating in the lava river, making her time with Chartog a complete waste]
We're waiting for you.

[furiously]
Son of a bitch!
[draws a fist back]
KISS *THIS!*
[slugs Chartog and knocks him into the lava river]

[disturbed]
Your people have strange customs.
[Julie steps onto the boat]

[huffs]
Tell me about it.
Blind adoration makes me so horny! Bring me a wench!
Bla!
What do you mean you can't find them? How do you lose a 6 foot bitch with a talking rock, huh?

[while a scan is being run on Planet Eden]
There are small traces in their system.

[sarcastically]
Yeah, immortality all over the place.

[after killing Tyler]
Now we must destroy the key.
Perhaps, perhaps not!
[strikes Julie with a whip]

[stunned]
O-Odin, why?
Because...
[rips open his robe and reveals himself to be a n Arakacian]
I am Arakacian! My charade fooled the insufferable Holy Landers and even that little stone idiot! What makes you think a pathetic mortal can stop me?
